snippet.title: Sonic Liquid Survival - SAGE 2018 Demo/Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Demo: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-liquid-survival-demo-1.177/

Sonic Liquid Survival is a 3D Sonic fan game with ambition to be less of a tech demo and more Sonic Adventure 3 as you truly imagined it, with unique zones, story and gameplay elements.

The game is built on Bumper Engine and Hedge Physics, and brings a lot of new features just like... just watch the trailer. And keep in mind I didn't spoil the entire demo in it.

The first demo will be available at Sonic Amateur Games Expo 2018 (SAGE 2018).
